Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to providing veterans' housing
Summary: Relates to providing veterans' housing; requires state agencies that provide shelter to homeless veterans to do so based on federal housing first principles without preconditions or barriers.
LawCode: Add §6-a, Veterans' Services L; amd §20, Soc Serv L; amd §§7.07 & 19.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, the social services law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing veterans' housing
